content:
[PAGE 1]
CITY OF CUPERTINO FINANCE COMMITTEE
REGULAR MEETING
February 12, 2026

CALL TO ORDER
Meeting called to order at 4:02 p.m.

MIDYEAR BUDGET REVIEW
Revenue performance is tracking 2.3% above forecast.
Expenditure categories with variance were public works and facilities maintenance.

[PAGE 2]
CAPITAL IMPROVEMENT PROGRAM STATUS
Project updates: library modernization, stormwater upgrades, park lighting replacement.

ACTION
Motion to recommend amended appropriations to City Council.
Vote: Approved unanimously.

NEXT STEPS
Staff to prepare final recommendation memo.
